value.title: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps
value.excerpt: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps. Use Visual Studio Code to create and run the web app locally.

value.title: Deploy real-time machine learning services with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to register and deploy ML models as real-rim services with the Azure Machine Learning service.

value.title: Search and organize repository history by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to search and organize repository history by using filters, blame, and cross-linking on GitHub.

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of creating deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

value.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Azure App Service Web Apps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Byron Tardif joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure App Service Web Apps, the best way to build and host web applications in the programming language of your choice without managing infrastructure. It offers auto-scaling and high availability, supports both Windows and Linux, and enables automated deployments
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jCfJWYocz1M" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Certifications for developers | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn about the Azure Certifications for developers.    For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. value.title: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 overview | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: James Baker joins Lara Rubbelke to introduce Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2, which is redefining cloud storage for big data analytics due to multi-modal (object store and file system) access and combining the best qualities of a dedicated analytics file system with those of a cloud-scale object store.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/McJj_N-pjgI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Event Hubs for Apache Kafka | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Shubha Vijayasarathy joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Event Hubs, which makes data ingestion simple, secure, and scalable. As a distributed streaming platform, Event Hubs enables you to stream your data from any source—storing and processing millions of events per second— so you can build dynamic
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/m3UEDhVYc-Q" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Even though Azure takes three copies of your virtual machines and stores them in Azure Storage, you still need to protect your data against ransomware, corruption, or accidental deletion. Kelly Anderson stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about how simple it is to set up Azure Backup, how its built-in

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Olivier Bloch joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure IoT and how it is more than just about connecting IoT devices and sending telemetry to the Cloud. They also talk about Azure IoT device topics such as twins, provisioning, and lifecycle management.  For more information, see:  Azure IoT Hub - http://aka.ms/azureiotgetstarted

value.title: Azure Security Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Kelly Anderson joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Security Center, which offers built-in security management and threat protection for your cloud workloads. Azure Security Center helps you find & fix vulnerabilities, aids in blocking malicious access and alerts you when your resources are under attack.

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for

value.title: How to connect virtual networks across Azure regions with Azure Global VNet peering | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Anavi Nahar joins Donovan Brown to show how virtual network peering enables you to connect networks seamlessly in Azure Virtual Network. The virtual networks appear as one for connectivity purposes. The traffic between virtual machines uses the Microsoft backbone infrastructure. Like traffic between

value.title: How to create a HTTP Trigger with Azure Logic Apps | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to create a HTTP Request Trigger that is inside an Azure Logic App. You will also learn how to apply a JSON Schema to validate the HTTP Requests. value.title: How to create a load balancer | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to configure load balancers and how to add virtual machines to them in the Azure Portal. value.excerpt: Vicky Harp joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Data Studio combined the simple and robust SQL query editing experience of tools like SSMS with the flexibility and collaboration of Jupyter Notebooks. The November 2019 release of Azure Data Studio included SQL Server 2019 Guide as a Jupyter Book, which

value.title: How to work with files in Azure App Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to work with files that you’ve uploaded to Azure App Service. Watch to find out what the different options are for interacting with the file system and your deployed applications in the Azure portal.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: Serverless containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this episode, Azure CTO Mark Russinovich joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can use Azure Container Instances (ACI) to host a containerized application. Mark deploys an image processing container in three ways: as a standalone ACI container, as part of a Logic Apps workflow, and as the backend
